name: Erico and Pete
description:
FINALLY PUBLISHED

Erico and Pete - Visual Novel, about adventures of bunch cartoonish characters like titular Erico and Pete, Monika, Kate, Supercavemanwomanboygirl, de and others!

Warning: Pete is not a good guy!!!

Warning: This game is not for kids

Thanks for helping in Erico and Pete's future!
